name: Jailbreak VR
description:
Only works on HTC Vive / Vive pro (and maybe with other SteamVR HeadSets)

You are in an ancient crypt,

Will you find the passage to incredible powers ?

Controls

Only free movement is supported.

  • Moving : Press and move your finger on the left trackpad (the orientation of the controller is also taken into account)
  • Turn on yourself (45°) : Press on the edges of the right trackpad
  • Grab, open door : Triggers
  • Inventory : Menu Buttons
